properties.title: Maven Dashboard Report Plugin : Continuum integration

section.name: About Continuum integration with Maven Dashboard Report Plugin

subsection.name: Configuring Continuum goals for Dashboard report usage
subsection.p: As described in Standard Usage, the dashboard report plugin must be running in 2 passes.
To work fine with Continuum, you must configure the goals as :

ol.li: first goal : mvn clean install site
let each report plugin generate its xml file.
aggregate all results of each report.
